Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've been looking around everywhere for something that adds binary or ternary planets, preferably with Kopernicus and Sigma Binary, but I haven't been able to find any. Can someone please help, I can't make one because Space Engine doesn't work on my computer and I can't get planets inside SOIs without major collisions (yes, gas giants). Repeat: planets, not stars.

It would be helpful if someone showed me a mod that exists, rather than waiting for someone to make one.

- - - Updated - - -

It would be helpful if someone showed me a mod that exists, rather than waiting for someone to make one.

Actually, maybe if someone spent all week trying to get it done, I'd be fine with that, as long as other people will enjoy it.
